fields.name: ComputeRole
fields.description: The type of role (IaaS or PaaS) this extension supports.

fields.name: HandlerSchema
fields.description: The schema defined by publisher, where extension consumers should provide settings in a matching schema.

fields.name: OperatingSystem
fields.description: The operating system this extension supports.

fields.name: SupportsMultipleExtensions
fields.description: Whether the handler can support multiple extensions.

fields.name: VMScaleSetEnabled
fields.description: Whether the extension can be used on xRP VMScaleSets. By default existing extensions are usable on scalesets, but there might be cases where a publisher wants to explicitly indicate the extension is only enabled for CRP VMs but not VMSS.
